phase.text: Newton's ghost! What are you doing up here? My generator is broken, meet me down there so we can fix it!
Hey... I still need your help inside!
Glad you could make it! Watch out for lightning bolts!

userResponse.option: A lil' lightning doesn't scare me!

phase.text: The energy from the storm should be able to power this machine. Try pulling those levers over there, we'll need just the right combination to make it work!
IT'S... ALIIIIIIIVE!!!! Oh? You're still here? I've added a special TINK figure to your My Stuff Box. What's that? You want MORE rewards?
Great Scott! The machine containing your rewards is stuck! Don't worry, I'll meet you back in the first room with the instructions to fix it!
The machine is working! It's reward time! You can also click on one of the slime pods to collect a replica item for your nest!
Einstein's underpants, you've done it! Enjoy your rewards!

userResponse.option: See you next mission. Er, next time!

phase.text: I can see found my ultra super secret contraption... But it'll only work once you've helped me downstairs!
